comments.body: This one here is a little bit tricky. The reason behind this is to extract `ConstantType` when one occurs

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +217,221 @@        // }
      case tr @ TermRef(qual, typeName) => 
        tr.termSymbol.tree match
          case vd: ValDef => inner(vd.tpt.tpe)
          case _          => link(tr.termSymbol)
